extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 111 and APSC 151 and APSC 171 and APSC 172 and registered in BSCE.

basic.description: The application of physical principles to examine and characterize the Earth at all scales. The Earth's physical properties and dynamic processes will be assessed and evaluated by integrating such topics as gravity, seismology, magnetism, geochronology, and heat flow, as related to scientific and engineering problems.
basic.subject: GEOE
basic.title: Geophysical Char Of The Earth
